parameters.name: Col
parameters.description: Column number with the desired header text; this is a 0-based index

title: IBomTable.GetHeaderText
description: Gets the header text for the specified column.

parameters.name: Col
parameters.description: Column number with the desired header text; this is a 0-based index

returns: Text string from the column header
remarks:
Before you use any of the IBomTable methods, activate the BOM table using
IBomTable::Attach3
. After you finish getting BOM data, use
IBomTable::Detach
to deactivate the table.
